title: Trump Misstates Facts in State of the Union Regarding Charlotte Stabbing
summary: Trump's claim about the suspect in a Charlotte stabbing case being an immigrant is false; the suspect is a U.S. citizen.
charlotte_impact: Misinformation from national figures can impact local perceptions and fuel political narratives.

title: Swimming Pool Filter Maker Hayward Has Significant Presence in Clemmons, NC
summary: Hayward, a Charlotte-based company, is a major employer in Clemmons, NC, with over 1,000 workers.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the importance of manufacturing jobs and a Charlotte-based company's regional impact.

title: Charlotte Trade Shows Leverage Custom Canopy Tents for Brand Visibility
summary: Trade show exhibitors in Charlotte are focusing on flexibility, visibility, and ROI through custom canopy tents.

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks Vice President of Business Development in Charlotte
summary: Charlotte-based Mosaic Capital Partners is seeking a VP of Business Development to expand employee ownership in businesses.

title: Florence Airport Passenger Numbers Rise Despite Losing Charlotte Flight
summary: Florence Regional Airport saw increased passenger traffic in 2025 but lost its American Airlines flight to Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the complexities of regional air travel and the impact of flight route changes.

title: Women Accused of Torturing and Killing Girl in Charlotte, NC
summary: Three women in Charlotte are charged with the child abuse death of Dominique Moody, allegedly torturing and confining her.
charlotte_impact: Details a horrific case of child abuse and raises concerns about child welfare in the community.

title: Charlotte Homeowners Reassessing When to Sell Amid Market Shifts
summary: Charlotte homeowners are reconsidering their selling timelines due to changing market conditions.

title: KPN Facilitates $20M in Acquisitions, Expands Economic Development Partnerships in Charlotte
summary: KPN Consulting Services facilitated $20M in acquisitions and expanded economic development partnerships.

title: Pedestrian Killed in Boiling Springs Crosswalk; Driver Charged
summary: A 71-year-old man was killed while in a crosswalk in Boiling Springs, NC; the driver faces a misdemeanor charge.
charlotte_impact: Highlights pedestrian safety concerns and the consequences of traffic accidents.

title: Union County Officials Seize Drugs, Candy-Branded THC Products

title: Shooting in Charlotte's South End Injures One
summary: A shooting on Tremont Avenue in Charlotte's South End resulted in one person being hospitalized with non-life-threatening injuries.

title: Firefighters Safe After Being Trapped in Steele Creek House Fire
summary: Two firefighters were trapped while battling a blaze in a Steele Creek home but are reported to be okay.

title: Black Chefs Featured at Charlotte Rooftop Event for Black History Month

charlotte_impact: Celebrates Black culture and supports leadership development through a community event.

title: Heart Disease Risk for US Women Projected to Rise Significantly by 2050
summary: A new report warns that heart disease risk for women in the U.S. is set to increase by over 33% by 2050.

title: South Carolina Sees Sharp Decline in Early Prenatal Care Access
summary: South Carolina is experiencing a significant decline in women accessing early prenatal care due to access, cost, and scheduling issues.
charlotte_impact: Highlights barriers to healthcare access and the importance of early prenatal care for maternal and infant health.
